# The `DebugValueUser` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Base class for tracking ValueAsMetadata/DIArgLists with user lookups and Owner callbacks outside of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/valueasmetadata">ValueAsMetadata</a>. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Base class for tracking ValueAsMetadata/DIArgLists with user lookups and Owner callbacks outside of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/valueasmetadata">ValueAsMetadata</a>.

Currently only inherited by <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dbgvariablerecord">DbgVariableRecord</a>; if other classes need to use it, then a SubclassID will need to be added (either as a new field or by making DebugValue into a PointerIntUnion) to discriminate between the subclasses in lookup and callback handling.

Definition at line 216 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/metadata-h">Metadata.h</a>.

### handleChangedValue() {#a51231385e9897d93b6ff7af9c96d1036}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void DebugValueUser::handleChangedValue (void &#42; Old, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/metadata">Metadata</a> &#42; NewDebugValue)</>}>
To be called by <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/replaceablemetadataimpl/#a2b9c0ec6595f7f4b7d737415a8cb0aaf">ReplaceableMetadataImpl::replaceAllUsesWith</a>, where <code>Old</code> is a pointer to one of the pointers in <code>DebugValues</code> (so should be type Metadata&#42;&#42;), and <code>NewDebugValue</code> is the new Metadata&#42; that is replacing &#42;Old.

For manually replacing elements of DebugValues, <code>resetDebugValue(Idx, NewDebugValue)</code> should be used instead.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/metadata-h/#l00235">235</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/metadata-h">Metadata.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/metadata-cpp/#l00158">158</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/metadata-cpp">Metadata.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
